identity.name: Nyaay Sathi
identity.mission: Simplify the justice system using technology and AI.

design_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Legal Authority with Tech Minimalism
Emotion First: Reduce anxiety, build trust
Content is King: Clarity in legal text is paramount
Zoom In: Focus on the human element
Negative Space: Luxurious spacing to reduce cognitive load
Contrast: High contrast for readability and impact

body.usage: Body text, UI elements, Legal content

mono.usage: Code snippets, Case IDs, Legal References

visual_enhancers.noise_texture: Subtle grain overlay on backgrounds to reduce digital flatness

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Outfit' font for all headings and 'Manrope' for body text.
Implement a dark mode first approach. The default theme is DARK.
Use the provided image URLs for the respective sections.
For the Login pages, implement the video backgrounds using the provided URLs. Ensure there is a dark overlay (bg-black/60) so the form is readable.
Use Shadcn components but customize them to match the 'Midnight Blue' theme (override default radius to 'rounded-xl' or 'rounded-2xl').
Do not use generic gradients. Use subtle radial glows.
Ensure the 'AI Chat' feature looks distinct - maybe use a different border color or glow to highlight it.
For the 'How It Works' section, use a step-by-step vertical timeline or a horizontal process flow with icons.
Ensure all buttons have the 'data-testid' attribute.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
